member.name: T:PondSharp.UserScripts.Entity
member.summary: Abstract entity class. All entities should extend this class to be properly loaded into the Pond.

member.name: P:PondSharp.UserScripts.Entity.TargetX
member.summary: Target position X to move toward.

member.name: P:PondSharp.UserScripts.Entity.TargetY
member.summary: Target position Y to move toward.

member.name: P:PondSharp.UserScripts.Entity.DidMoveThisTick
member.summary: Did the entity move this tick;

member.name: M:PondSharp.UserScripts.Entity.SetMoveTowards(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set a target position for the entity

member.name: M:PondSharp.UserScripts.Entity.CanMoveTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if the entity can move to a World Position
member.returns: If the entity can move to the World Position

member.name: M:PondSharp.UserScripts.Entity.MoveTo(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Tries to move the entity to the World Position
member.returns: If the entity moved to the World Position

member.name: M:PondSharp.UserScripts.Entity.MoveTowardsTarget
member.summary: Execute a move towards the current set target position

member.name: M:PondSharp.UserScripts.Entity.CanChangeColorTo(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if entity can change its color to the specified color.
member.returns: If the entity can change its color to the specified color.

member.name: M:PondSharp.UserScripts.Entity.ChangeColor(System.Int32)
member.summary: Tries to change the entity's color to the specified color.
member.returns: If the entity's color was changed to the specified color.

member.name: M:PondSharp.UserScripts.Entity.CanChangeViewDistance(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if entity can changes its view distance to the specified distance.
member.param: Distance that visible entities will use.
member.returns: If the entity can change its view distance to the specified distance.

member.name: M:PondSharp.UserScripts.Entity.ChangeViewDistance(System.Int32)
member.summary: Tries to change the entity's view distance to the specified distance.
member.param: Distance that visible entities will use.
member.returns: If the entity's view distance was change the specified distance.

member.name: P:PondSharp.UserScripts.Entity.VisibleEntities
member.summary: Entities which are within the ViewDistance

member.name: M:PondSharp.UserScripts.Entity.OnCreated
member.summary:
Called immediately after the Entity is created and loaded into the world.
Useful for initialization tasks.

member.name: M:PondSharp.UserScripts.Entity.OnDestroy
member.summary: Called before the Entity is destroyed and removed from the world.

member.summary: Called on every tick.
